title: Walking with comfort again
text: I am so grateful to have found Dr. Mini! I have a 16 1/2 year old 45 pound Elks hound mix with severe hind leg muscle loss and arthritis. I am amazed at how chiropractic adjustments help her walk so much better and more pain free. She was falling a lot and it makes sense at her age falls would put her out of alignment. Everyone who sees her getting around is impressed and I credit that to Dr. Mini’s adjustments.

title: Cannot Login IOS Facebook for iPad Since 3-5-24 Global Outage
text:
I haven't been able to login IOS Facebook App on my 5th Gen. iPad since the 3-5-24 the FB/IG global outage, even with cleared data & cookies, it doesn't recognize my user & pass & asks me to "try again", though I can use the very same user & pass to login Facebook from all of my other devices.

Even with looks to be security updates, it's the same issue, I must use either Safari or Chrome IOS browsers to login my FB, I haven't read of any other uses having this particular issue.

title: Fix vulnerability to malicious code
text: There’s an alleged video link to an alleged news story about someone who died in a car wreck, or at least that is the implication. When you click on it because one of your friends (apparently) posted it, somehow it posts itself from your account as though you have lost someone in a car wreck, which makes the viewer repost it as though they lost someone, etc. Not sure if this is password security related but it seems more so a vulnerability on the app code. This should be fixed ASAP
